about:
I am a fourth year computer science and statistics student attending the University of Toronto, previously from Boston.

Over the summer, I interned at Amazon Web Services on RDS, the cloud relational database service. I'll be joining Wish in January 2022 as a software engineer intern on the Marketplace team.

I have a diverse collection of interests which include boba, clothing, and photography - feel free to check out my photography portfolio linked above!
